fullplot: "Offside" is about a group of Iranian girls who attempts to enter Tehran's Azadi Stadium dressed as boys in order to watch a big football match but some get caught and arrested. After the establishment of the Islamic Republic in Iran, women are not allowed to enter the stadiums.
plot: Struggle of Women in a country that excludes them from entering the stadiums.
title: Offside

tomatoes.consensus: A spirited film that explores gender politics with comedy, intelligence, and a variety of interesting characters.
